mapper.insert:
select SEQ.nextval FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO C##GD.ADMIN (seq, ID, PW, NAME, BIRTHDATE, PHONENUM) VALUES(#{seq} ,#{id}, #{pw}, #{name}, #{birthdate}, #{phonenum})
INSERT INTO ACCOUNT (AC_CODE, AC_NAME, AC_REGNUM, REGDATE, AC_TEL, CEO_NAME) VALUES(#{ac_code}, #{ac_name}, #{ac_regnum}, SYSDATE, #{ac_tel}, #{ceo_name})
INSERT INTO GOODS (G_CODE, G_NAME, PRICE) VALUES(#{g_code}, #{g_name}, #{price})
